title: FT T206 HOFers for 33 Goudey Ruth

posts.post_title: FT T206 HOFers for 33 Goudey Ruth
posts.post_content: Looking to trade or partially trade for lowish psa grade Ruth 53 (yellow) and/or 181 (green).  Not particularly interested in selling these but may come around.  PM me if interested and thanks, Jim
